tool_description: Creates detailed procurement timelines with milestones, deadlines, and critical path analysis.

holiday_exclusions.description: Holidays to exclude from timeline calculations

error_messages: Invalid date sequence: RFP issue date must be before contract start date.
Insufficient response time: Proposal response period must be at least 15 days.
Timeline conflict: Evaluation period extends beyond contract start date.
Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 date-time format.
Negative time periods: All time periods must be positive integers.
usage: Set RFP issue date, response period, evaluation time, and contract start date. Add optional mandatory events and holiday exclusions. The tool creates a comprehensive procurement timeline.

key_milestones.description: Critical dates and milestones with descriptions

timeline_feasibility.description: Assessment of timeline feasibility and recommendations
